meanings.definition: A small peg with a concave top used to support a golf ball before it is struck.
A T-shaped peg with a concave top used to hold a golf ball for an initial shot.
A mark aimed at in certain games, such as curling or quoits.
A small peg with a concave top used to support a golf ball before it is struck.
